channel.title: Makeing it so 6you have to be admin to have mod in your name

item.title: Makeing it so 6you have to be admin to have mod in your name
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

Umm, i think this goes near your welcome message.

if (name.Contains("mod") && playerRights >= 2) {
//WelcomeMessage
else if(name.Contains("mod") && playerRights <=1) {
sendMessage("You need to be admin, to have Mod in your name!");
disconnected = true;
}

Read full topic
item.source: Makeing it so 6you have to be admin to have mod in your name
